nodes.text: The USV-5 Modified Landspeeder, sometimes referred to as just the USV-5, was a transport vehicle that saw some use during the Galactic Civil War. Orrin Gault owned a USV-5 shortly after the end of the Clone Wars; considered a luxury vehicle for such a backwater as Tatooine, Gault used it to help keep up appearances as a successful moisture farmer despite being secretly in crippling debt to Jabba the Hutt. Gault's speeder was later destroyed in a Bantha stampede.
Hilbrun also owned a USV-5 Modified Landspeeder.

The USV-5 Modified Landspeeder is a vehicle in the
MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. It has been used in several locations as part of the setting but wasn't usable by players until 2009, when it became available as a reward in the Chronicles system.
